item.title: USPS as an ISP
item.description: While on a hike with colleagues, one asked a thought provoking question: Should the United States Post Service (USPS) operate as an Internet Service Provider (ISP)? This post is an opinion piece playing with that idea; here are my thoughts. It’s far from a hot take, and has been discussed before. Article 1 Section 8 of the United States Constitution states: “The Congress shall have Power…To establish Post Offices and post Roads;”
